subject: Hockey, Ice
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: The Islanders are scheduled to begin preseason play in Brooklyn on Sept. 21, but a tour of the team’s facilities at Barclays Center revealed work remaining to be done.
snippet: The Islanders are scheduled to begin preseason play in Brooklyn on Sept. 21, but a tour of the team’s facilities at Barclays Center revealed work remaining to be done.
